#include <iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#define lli long long
#define MOD 1000000007
#define S(a) ((a)*(a))%MOD
#define inv(a) (power((a),MOD-2))
using namespace std;
lli power(lli b, lli e) {
	if(e == 0 || b == 1) return 1;
	if(e == 1) return b;
	if(e == 2) return (b*b)%MOD;
	return ( ((e%2==1)?b:1) * power((power(b,e/2)),2) ) % MOD;
}
lli m[5002],fact[10001],inv_fact[5001];
int main() {
	int t,u;
	m[0] = 1; m[1] = 26; u = 1;
	fact[1] = inv_fact[1] = fact[0] = inv_fact[0] = 1;
	for(int i = 2 ; i < 5001 ; i++) {
		m[i] = (25*m[i-1])%MOD;
		fact[i] = (fact[i-1]*i)%MOD;
		inv_fact[i] = inv(fact[i]);
	}
	cin >> t;
	while (t--) {
		lli n,ans,fans=0,c,r,k;
		cin >> n;
		for(k = 1 ; k <= n ; k++) {
			ans = c = 1;
			/*for(r = k+1 ; r <= n ; r++) {
				c =	( ((c*(r-1))%MOD) * inv(r-k) )%MOD; 
				ans = (ans+c)%MOD;
			}*/
			ans = ( ((fact[n]*inv_fact[k])%MOD) * inv_fact[n-k] )%MOD;
			fans = (fans + (((ans*ans)%MOD) * m[k])%MOD)%MOD;
		}
		printf("%lld\n",fans);
	}
	return 0;
}
